Meet The Loving Dog Left Locked in Closet After Owners Moved Now Looking For Love
Great Dog Rescue New England, a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Star Bright, a resilient 2-year-old Boxer and Black Lab mix who was let down by humans in a huge way. According to the local rescue, Star once had a home and a family of her own. However, when her former human family sold their house and moved away, they first locked Star in a closet and left her there with no food. She was not discovered until the new owners of the home found her, and luckily, it was not too late. Since entering their care, Great Dog Rescue New England has placed Star with a loving foster family where she is learning to trust humans again.

Meet The Little Dog Who Survived His Entire Life on the Streets Now Looking For a Loving Family
Great Dog Rescue New England, a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, recently introduced Nemo, a charming one-year-old Cairn Terrier and Cattle Dog mix who is patiently waiting for his forever family to come find him. Nemo's journey began when he was born to stray parents. Though it is unclear how he spent his early life living on the streets, he was eventually brought into Great Dog Rescue New England’s care alongside three others who were also born to other strays. Now living with a Northern foster family, Nemo is finally learning what it means to be loved and have a home. His forever home, however, is still something he has not found.

CHEYENNE, WY — July 2, 2025 — In a bold act of civil disobedience, transgender woman Rihanna Kelver, 27, walked into the women’s restroom inside the Wyoming State Capitol—directly beside Governor Mark Gordon’s office—in protest of the state’s new bathroom law. Severe thunderstorm & flash flood risks rise North Carolina & Virginia through Thursday July 10
Thunderstorms are front and center across Virginia and North Carolina for the next several days and as each day passes, we have increasing risks for severe thunderstorms and flash flooding. The Storm Prediction Center is indicating that a slight risk or a 15 percent chance exists Wednesday and possibly Thursday across North Carolina and Virginia. The risks from these severe thunderstorms are damaging winds in excess of 55 mph and hail up to 2 inches in diamater.

Local Habitat for Humanity ReStore Closes Doors After 10-Years
Old Colony Habitat for Humanity's ReStore in Attleboro has permanently closed its doors after serving the community for ten years, the organization announced this week. The ReStore operated on a model that benefited both the environment and affordable housing, accepting new and gently used items that might otherwise end up in landfills and selling them at significant discounts. All proceeds directly funded Old Colony Habitat's home building projects, which provide affordable housing to families in need.

Polk County Sheriff Steals Money From Driver During Traffic Stop.

Meet Winn Dixie: A Sweet 2-Year-Old Schnoodle Mix Searching For Love
Great Dog Rescue New England, a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Winn Dixie, a sweet two-year-old schnoodle mix who is ready to find her forever home. After being found as a stray in Mississippi with her puppies and taken in by Great Dog Rescue New England, Winn Dixie proved herself to be "an amazing momma to her babies," according to rescue staff. Now that her puppies are fully weaned, it’s Winn’s turn to be taken care of. She is currently learning what it means to rely on humans in her foster home and is eager to meet the forever family she will one day be a part of.
 · user · 32.9K followers
Dianna Carney
After Years of Neglect This Gentle Giant is Still Waiting for Her Happily Ever After
Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, is seeking help to find a permanent home for Ava, a 5-year-old Rottweiler who continues to wait for her forever family. "Ava is still waiting for her love match! Can you share her post?" The rescue shared with their communiy. Despite her challenging past, Ava has blossomed in her foster home and is ready to find her forever family. Ava's journey began in a rural shelter in central Texas, where she was rescued after years of being used for breeding and living in a garage. "Rescued from a neglectful situation—shockingly, at the hands of a former police officer—Ava is now beginning her journey toward healing," the rescue organization shared on her profile.
 · user · 32.9K followers
Dianna Carney
Meet The Tiny Puppy Searching For Love After Recovering From Deadly Illness
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Xena, a brave 11-week-old puppy who has already overcome significant challenges in her young life. Not only was she living on the streets as a stray at only a few weeks old, but when Xena was found, she had the deadly illness Parvo, which can often be a death sentence to young dogs. Thankfully, after bringing her into their care, GDRNE was happily able to report that, “She has survived and now she is the happiest girl ever who is ready to find her forever family!” The rescue went on to give this strong girl the nickname “Warrior Princess” to highlight that she is a true survivor.

Gang Member Sentenced to Two Life Terms for Murders, Drug Trafficking
Myron Williams among multiple defendants facing lengthy federal prison terms for violent racketeering crimes in Jersey City. NORTHERN NEW JERSEY - Myron Williams, 31, of Newark—also known by the aliases “Money” and “Tunchi”—has been sentenced to two consecutive life terms for his role in a violent racketeering conspiracy linked to the Marion Gardens Housing Complex in Jersey City. The sentencing, delivered by U.S. District Judge Michael E. Farbiarz in Newark federal court, follows Williams’s conviction for racketeering conspiracy, murder in aid of racketeering, drug trafficking, and firearm offenses.

Dianna Carney
Meet The Tiny 6lb Puppy With Unique Needs Who is Searching For Love
Great Dog Rescue New England, a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet a sweet little dog named Porter. This tiny 8-week-old Australian Shepherd mix, weighing in at a mere 6.5lbs, is in search of a patient and loving forever family. While there are countless dogs in rescue care looking for their second chances, Porter comes with a disadvantage that might make it even harder to get that chance. Due to a double merle genetic defect, Porter is blind and will need a patient family that can help him with more specialized training.
 · user · 32.9K followers
Dianna Carney
Meet The Two Bonded Shih Tzu Mixes Who Are Searching For Love Together
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Sam and Gabby, a bonded pair of Shih Tzu mixes who have spent their entire lives together. According to the rescue, “Sam and Gabby had an owner that loved them, and it shows.” The reason for these two ending up in rescue care was not provided, but one thing is clear: They need a home where they can remain together. Now living with a loving foster family, these inseparable companions are ready to enter the next part of their lives together.
 · user · 32.9K followers
Dianna Carney
Retired Sled Dog Now Searching For New Home After Former Family No Longer Able To Care For Her
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Reagan, a senior husky mix looking for a second chance at love and happiness. Until recently, Reagan was living in a loving home with a family who cared deeply for her. Due to unspecified reasons, Reagan’s family is “no longer able to care for her,” and they made the decision to surrender her to Great Dog Rescue New England. “We want to give this girl a second shot at love,” shares the rescue. “She has been with GDRNE for a month now and we just can't wait to find her a new forever home!”

Richmond's Arthur Ashe Bridge will be replaced
The Arthur Ashe Boulevard Bridge, which connects Scott's Addiction to the Diamond District in Richmond, Virginia is over 75 years old. Needless to say, the bridge that links the two neighborhoods has exceeded its useful life. Besides, the bridge is considered an eyesore with tree-sized weeds and the Richard's gentlemen's club in sight.

4 more teens and a 20-year-old missing in Missouri: 27 are missing for 2025 as of June 14, 2025
Update: Charity Smith, Skylar Horn, Hannah Moore, and Bertram Griffin have been removed from the list. As of June 14, 2025, according to the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC), there are four more missing teenagers and one missing 20-year-old on its website, bringing the total missing for 2025 to 27.
